reviews.review: Tá virando cópia do PUBG, falei e sai correndo

A Prettier version of the good old Counter Strike that we loved since a long time, you could almost say, loved for generations.

Of all the games I've played.... this is one of them.

It's a great game and as a gold nova one I feel as though I have truly mastered the mechanics. Even though I have nothing left to learn at this point I still enjoy a game every now and then with the bois.
Great games, If you aren't toxic, you do not get cheaters. Honestly great game.

Takes a while tor learn and become good but it feels rewarding once you have. Knowing the spray patterns and having consistent aim is one of the first things id recommend to learn and at the same time you should try and learn the maps and nades on the maps.
this game will give you highs and lows best with friends or make friends in a solo comp match im also only doing this for grand prix summer sale
